other_tests.findings: Severe right atrial enlargement, thickened tricuspid valve, large atrial septal defect with right-to-left shunt
Revealed calcified ridge and large thrombotic mass on the tricuspid annulus and anterior tricuspid valve leaflet; tricuspid valve appeared normal after excision
other_tests.changes_over_time: Postoperative course was uneventful, and normal tricuspid valve appearance was restored
